intro: Psychotria hundensis, commonly known as the Congo Psychotria, is a species of flowering plant in the Rubiaceae family. It is native to tropical regions of Africa, particularly the Democratic Republic of the Congo. The plant is characterized by its simple, opposite leaves and small, tubular flowers that are typically greenish-white in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments and is often found in lowland rainforests. The plant has been studied for its potential pharmacological properties due to the presence of various alkaloids.
